summary: AN ORDINANCE vacating a portion of the Alley in Block 29, Second addition to the Town of Seattle as Laid off by the Heirs of Sarah A. Bell's Second Addition (deceased) (Commonly know as Heirs of Sarah Bell's Second Addition to the Town of Seattle) on the petition of Olive Way Joint Ventures, accepting an easement for storm drain purposes, accepting a deed for street/alley purposes and a Property Use and Development Agreement for the purpose stated therein. (Comptroller File No. 295986).
